text: Uglovsky District () is an administrativeLaw #28-ZS and municipalLaw #87-ZS district (raion), one of the fifty-nine in Altai Krai, Russia. It is located in the southwest of the krai. The area of the district is . Its administrative center is the rural locality (a selo) of Uglovskoye. As of the 2010 Census, the total population of the district was 13,888, with the population of Uglovskoye accounting for 31.5% of that number. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Districts of Altai Krai Category:1924 establishments in Russia
title: Uglovsky District, Altai Krai
